BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Fernando Bohorquez, Jr. to the Council for its advice and consent concerning his reappointment to the New York City Conflicts of Interest Board, pursuant to Section 2602 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Fernando A. Bohorquez, Jr., NYC Conflicts of Interest Board

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Salvatore Scibetta, to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment as a member of the New York City Board of Standards and Appeals, pursuant to Section 31 and 659 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Salvatore Scibetta, Board of Standards and Appeals

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Fernando Bohorquez, Jr. to the Council for its advice and consent concerning his reappointment to the New York City Conflicts of Interest Board, pursuant to Section 2602 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
